workflow.name: Sales Presentation Generator
workflow.description: A workflow that generates professional sales presentation decks (PPTX) based on client context, deal information, and sales objectives.

nodes.label: Presentation Details
nodes.description: User provides presentation details: client name, industry, pain points, products, presentation type, number of slides, and tone.

nodes.label: PPT Generator Agent
nodes.description: Generates professional sales presentation content including slide titles, bullet points, value propositions, and speaker notes. Outputs downloadable PPTX files.

nodes.label: Generated Presentation
nodes.description: Returns the generated PPTX presentation file for download.
